'''This distro is inactive as of January 2020.'''

SuperX is a commercial operating system based on Ubuntu. It's the only commercially supported OS from India. It's sponsored by TechnoSunZ Software Pvt. Ltd. It currently uses Ubuntu repositories as it's software sources.
